page.title: 16THE NEW SCHOOL
page.content: Bottisham Primary School is 12 years old. It was first opened in January 1972.Mr.G.Edwards (Chief Education Officer)opened the building.Mrs.A. Buchanan,Mrs.S.Kirkbride,Mrs.R.Barker and Mrs.J.Philips worked at the school when it opened and still work there. There were five classes at first,now there are ten.A new school was built because there were too many children inside.The old school was next to the playing field at the Village College. This new building took 6_8 months to build.The County Architect designed this school.Mrs.Kirkbride likes this school best.In the old school it was so small that small children had to eat in their classrooms.
